item.title: vr
item.description: i picked up an oculus rift after my last paycheck :P it was half christmas present. these are some of the games that i’m most excited for: elite dangerous lone echo / echo arena dirt rally gun club vr eagle flight robo recall have you played any other cool vr games lately?
